short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automate downvoting for OpenAI chat responses.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automate the downvoting of AI responses in OpenAI Chat. 

This extension automatically clicks the "thumbs down" button on responses, saving time and ensuring consistent feedback.

Features:
- Automated feedback: Automatically downvotes responses in OpenAI Chat.
- Simple control: Toggle the feature ON or OFF with a single click on the toolbar icon.
- Persistent settings: Your ON/OFF preference is saved even after closing the browser.
- Dynamic integration: Works on both new and existing tabs where OpenAI Chat is active.
- Real-time observation: Monitors the page for new responses and processes them automatically.

How it works:
1. Install the extension.
2. Click the toolbar icon to enable or disable the feature.
3. Visit OpenAI Chat (https://chat.openai.com). The extension will automatically process responses when enabled.

Who it’s for:
- Researchers analyzing OpenAI’s response quality.
- Developers and testers providing feedback to improve AI models.
- Regular users of OpenAI Chat who want to save time on repetitive actions.

Technical details:
- Operates only on OpenAI Chat URLs and requires minimal permissions.
- Does not collect or transmit user data.

GitHub repository:
This is an open-source project. View the source code or contribute at https://github.com/rrmn/bad-bot
